name: Kleptorilla
description:
Kleptorilla is a game, currently in development by 5 students, that are in their second year of college on the HvA. Our game is designed for you to have fun!

Are you tired of all these other animals having pretty cages and pretty items unlike you? You can change all of that! Steal what you want! Annoy whoever you want! Throw poop at that annoying tiger, or those petty penguins!
Do beware. You do have to be careful, because not everyone likes it when you throw poop at them or steal their items. Especially the guards, they are not a big fan of you going outside of your cage.

If you have any ideas for further development in our game please let us know!
